content: So I'm still vaguely working on finding a way around the bug in rust-analyzer that is making it crash for the zebra codebase, right now I'm working on getting a better repro of the issue that doesn't involve any deps, if possible.
and im left wondering, does anyone know of a tool for combining all of ones dependencies into a single crate?

Nope, we only have an issue that we need to do this :(

https://github.com/rust-analyzer/rust-analyzer/issues/3149
awesome ty, that pnkfelix blog in particular looks super helpful
